name: CAPCOG Regional Open Data Site
description: The CAPCOG GIS Program uses its mapping and analytical expertise to aid local jurisdictions and community partners. The site compiles a variety of mapping datasets that pertain to the 10-county region, intended to provide planners from all government disciplines access to mapped data. Data is sourced from CAPCOG and aggregated from federal, state, and local public sources, serving as a single-point resource for regional geographic information.
